notes.text: The description text is now positioned below the title when the object page header is collapsed
We now only include the properties of visible custom columns in the backend request to improve performance
We now exclude custom filters that aren't applicable to a list report with multi-entity sets
We now use delayed deletion provided by the model to ensure toolbar buttons don't flicker while discarding a draft
We now ensure that using a dynamic semantic object in the title of a quick view card works correctly
Application developers can now incorporate the column header in the calculation of the column width
We now ensure that we preserve the state of the filter bar from the previous variant while switching between different variants
We have updated the page layout to comply with the changed guidelines
Application developers can now use adaptNavigationContext to change the selectionvariant
We no longer show the paginator buttons on the object page after it was refreshed
Key users can now remove and reveal sections and subsections on the object page
